Eric Schmidt 's departure had been a long time coming, says Charles Arthur in The Guardian: After slipups with search, Street View and Android, it's clear that Google needs tighter control at the top- and Eric Schmidt is not the man for the job. What of Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin ? He is said to be focusing on strategic projects and is particularly interested in social networking. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research. Still Fewer Workers Than Microsoft Even if it surpasses 31,000 employees this year, Google Inc. will still have far fewer people than Microsoft

Executive producer Jonathan Wald said in a release: King Hussein 'm thrilled Katie Nelson Thomson is joining the Piers Morgan Tonight team. She brings unmatched experience and leadership in the booking and producing of big-name interviews and she will be instrumental in helping lead a talented team of bookers and producers. Thomson has produced exclusive profiles of Oprah Winfrey , Hillary Clinton , Michael Jackson , Barbra Streisand , Angelina Jolie , Elizabeth Taylor , Martha Stewart ( before and after her conviction), the parents of JonBenet Ramsey , Colin Powell and Queen Noor of Jordan after King Hussein 's death
